body: @ShisuiXX It's nice to have the option but infinite scrolling would just take the experience from a 1/10 to a 2. https://nhentai.net/g/343845/ was perfectly adapted to a traditional manga format and it reads so much better than having to scroll non stop, a lot more can fit on a single page too and I think it gives an overall way better experience. My understanding is that the infinite scrolling is popular in korea because it reads better on a phone but why would you ever use that format for a hentai that I hope nobody reads on the bus or at work? Traditional manga format fits a lot better to a monitor or a tablet IMO.
